PersonalStatement.text: Carlos Brooks, born on 1971-01-22, is a Male based in New Amandaburgh, Puerto Rico. He is Divorced and holds Thai nationality. Currently working at Matthews-Richards.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Banks-Nelson from 2009 to 2018.
Senior Marketing Specialist at Matthews-Richards, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Technical University of Liberec
Master's in Engineering from King Mongkut's University of Technology North Bangkok

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys cycling.
